intro: Onosma sarvestanica, commonly known as Persian burnet, is a flowering plant native to Iran. It belongs to the family Boraginaceae and is characterized by its hairy stems and clusters of small, pinkish-blue flowers. Onosma sarvestanica is valued for its ornamental qualities and has traditional uses in herbal medicine.
